# Intermediate Cache Nodes

This directory contains intermediate cache nodes for the Citadel Agent workflow engine.

## Overview
Intermediate cache nodes provide moderatley advanced caching operations including:
- Multi-level cache hierarchies
- Cache warming strategies
- Cache invalidation policies
- Cache performance monitoring
- Distributed cache management

## Available Nodes
- `multi_level_cache_node.go` - Manages multi-tiered cache architectures
- `cache_warmer_node.go` - Implements cache pre-population strategies
- `invalidation_policy_node.go` - Applies cache invalidation rules
- `cache_monitor_node.go` - Monitors cache performance metrics
- `distributed_cache_manager_node.go` - Manages distributed cache clusters

## Usage
These nodes are designed for intermediate caching workflows with enhanced functionality.

## Requirements
- Multiple cache tier configurations
- Cache monitoring systems
- Distributed caching service connectivity
- Appropriate resource allocation

## Security & Permissions
- Requires multi-tier cache access permissions
- Distributed system management privileges

---

**Part of Citadel Agent v1** - Advanced Workflow Automation Platform
